name: Run Jack Run
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This game runs smoother and is more responsive when playing the downloaded version!

Made for the Blackthornprod Jam 2020 in one week - Theme: Less is More

You play as Jack the Rabbit, as he runs through various worlds collecting his carrots.

There is only 1 button (space) to control Jack, a 16x16 pixel sprite, and only 16 colours in the whole game. Less is More.

KNOWN BUGS

There appears to be a bug with the sound manager that crashes the game at random - I am so sorry about this... Very frustrating when the game is brought down by a 3rd party plugin :(
